title: Vincent Mashami
text: Vincent Mashami is a Rwandan <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach who was appointed manager of the <a href="Rwanda%20national%20football%20team">Rwandan national team</a> in August 2018. He has previously coached the national team at youth level, and also club side <a href="Arm%C3%A9e%20Patriotique%20Rwandaise%20F.C.">APR</a>.
